    Ki·ªÉm tra query params v√† chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu khi l√†m API v·ªõi NestJS

    D·∫°o n√†y m√¨nh ƒëang h·ªçc m·ªôt c√°i g√¨ ƒë√≥ m·ªõi. V√¨ c≈©ng ƒëang l√†m vi·ªác ·ªü backend v·ªõi vai tr√≤ ch√≠nh l√† CRUD cho d·ª± √°n c√πng Django, n√™n m√¨nh ch·ªçn m·ªôt c√°ch l√†m backend kh√°c, v·ªõi m·ªôt ng√¥n ng·ªØ kh√°c, ƒë√≥ ch√≠nh l√† NestJS c√πng typescript.

    V√† th·∫ø l√† m·ªôt th·∫ø gi·ªõi m·ªõi xu·∫•t hi·ªán üòÖ

    M√¨nh l√†m m·ªôt project demo nho nh·ªè v·ªõi chat service, ch√≠nh l√† l√† API t·∫°o room, r·ªìi l·∫•y c√°c message trong room, ‚Ä¶

    Trong b√†i vi·∫øt h√¥m nay, m√¨nh s·∫Ω l√†m vi·ªác tr√™n API l·∫•y t·∫•t c·∫£ c√°c tin nh·∫Øn trong m·ªôt room, v√† c√πng vi·∫øt l·∫°i m·ªôt c√°ch validation m√† m√¨nh th·∫•y kh√° hay t·ª´ NestJS.

    M√¨nh s·∫Ω ƒëi theo h∆∞·ªõng ti·∫øp c·∫≠n c·ªßa ng∆∞·ªùi ch∆∞a bi·∫øt g√¨ v·ªÅ NestJS c≈©ng nh∆∞ c√°ch m√¨nh ti·∫øp c·∫≠n document v√† √°p d·ª•ng c√°ch validations x·ªãn x√≤ t·ª´ b·∫°n ·∫•y.

    GET /{roomId}/messages/?limit={x}&offset={y}

    ·ªû tr√™n l√† m·ªôt endpoint d√πng ƒë·ªÉ l·∫•y t·∫•t c·∫£ messages trong room c√≥ id l√† roomId, v·ªõi c√°c query param l√† limit, offset, limit c√≥ gi√° tr·ªã m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh l√† 10, c√≤n offset m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh l·∫•y t·ª´ ƒë·∫ßu l√† 0.

    V·ªõi limit l√† s·ªë message nh·∫≠n ƒë∆∞·ª£c c√≤n offset s·∫Ω l√† b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu l·∫•y t·ª´ message n√†o.

    V·∫≠y th√¨ v√¨ sao l·∫°i c·∫ßn ki·ªÉm tra ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu c·ªßa limit v√† offset ·ªü ƒë√¢y? M√¨nh ƒëo√°n b·∫°n t·ª´ng l√†m API th√¨ s·∫Ω bi·∫øt, query param s·∫Ω c√≥ ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu l√† string. C∆° m√† limit, offset khi m√¨nh d√πng ƒë·ªÉ g·ªçi khi m√¨nh l·∫•y d·ªØ li·ªáu t·ª´ database(Moongo), v√≠ d·ª• model.find().limit(x).skip(y), th√¨ b·∫Øt bu·ªôc x, y l√† number.

    Do ƒë√≥, n·∫øu m√¨nh kh√¥ng ki·ªÉm tra v√† chuy·ªÉn string ‚Äô10‚Äô v·ªÅ s·ªë 10 th√¨ s·∫Ω b·ªã l·ªói khi query database.

    Okie, v·∫≠y l√† ƒë√£ hi·ªÉu v√¨ sao c·∫ßn validation ·ªü ƒë√¢y r·ªìi, ti·∫øp theo m√¨nh s·∫Ω ƒëi qua c√°c c√°ch validation m√¨nh th·ª≠ nghi·ªám:

    C√°ch 1: Ki·ªÉm tra v√† chuy·ªÉn v·ªÅ ki·ªÉu s·ªë b·∫±ng c∆°m

    M√¨nh s·∫Ω ƒë∆∞a ra 3 snippets code cho version ƒë·∫ßu ti√™n m√¨nh l√†m:

    file room.controller.ts:

      @Get(":roomId/messages")
  async findMessages(
    @Query() { limit, offset }: MessagePaginationParam,
    @Param("roomId") roomId: number
  ) {
    return this.service.findMessages(roomId, limit, offset)
  }
v·ªõi MessagePaginationParam ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a nh∆∞ sau:

class PaginationParam {
  static DEFAULT_LIMIT: number = 10;
  static DEFAULT_OFFSET: number = 0;

  limit?: number
  offset?: number
}

    ti·∫øp ƒë·∫øn l√† room.service.ts:

      async findMessages(
    roomId: number,
    limit?: number,
    offset?: number
  ): Promise<MessagePagination> {

    let limit = limit || MessagePaginationParam.DEFAULT_LIMIT;
    let offset = offset || MessagePaginationParam.DEFAULT_OFFSET;

    if (typeof(limit) === "string") {
      limit = parseInt(limit)
    }

    if (typeof(offset) === "string") {
      offset = parseInt(offset)
    }

    const results = await this.model.find(
       { roomId: roomId }
    ).limit(limit).skip(offset).exec()

    return {
      count: results.length,
      results: results
    }
  }

    ·ªû version ƒë·∫ßu ti√™n, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ th·∫•y m√¨nh l√†m 2 vi·ªác:

    ‚Äì M·ªôt l√†, n·∫øu kh√¥ng c√≥ gi√° tr·ªã limit, offset truy·ªÅn v√†o, m√¨nh s·∫Ω g√°n n√≥ b·∫±ng gi√° tr·ªã m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh t·ª´ l·ªõp PaginationParam

    ‚Äì Hai l√†, ki·ªÉm tra ki·ªÉu c·ªßa limit, offset b·∫±ng tay, t·ª©c l√† m√¨nh check typeof c·ªßa n√≥ c√≥ b·∫±ng ‚Äústring‚Äù kh√¥ng r·ªìi d√πng parseInt() ƒë·ªÉ chuy·ªÉn v·ªÅ s·ªë nguy√™n.

    S·∫Ω c√≥ tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p n√≥ nh·∫≠n gi√° tr·ªã m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh l√† MessagePaginationParam.DEFAULT_LIMIT, l√† s·ªë n√™n c·∫ßn ki·ªÉm tra ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu tr∆∞·ªõc khi chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi.

    C√°ch 2: B·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu ti·∫øp c·∫≠n v·ªõi pipe validation c·ªßa NestJS

    B·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë·ªçc th√™m v·ªÅ Pipes trong NestJS ·ªü ƒë√¢y.Th√¨ c√≥ th·ªÉ hi·ªÉu n√¥m na l√† pipe l√† c√°c ƒë∆∞·ªùng ·ªëng, n√≥ s·∫Ω d·∫´n d·ªØ li·ªáu c·ªßa m√¨nh qua ƒë√≥ tr∆∞·ªõc, l√†m s·∫°ch g√¨ ƒë√≥ r·ªìi m·ªõi ƒëi ƒë·∫øn c√°c n∆°i kh√°c.

    ·ªû ƒë√¢y, m√¨nh ƒë√£ d√πng ParseIntPipe ƒë·ªÉ chuy·ªÉn string v·ªÅ s·ªë integer, ƒë·ªìng th·ªùi s·ª≠ d·ª•ng gi√° tr·ªã m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh c·ªßa query param ngay trong room.controller.ts

      import { ParseIntPipe } from "@nestjs/common";

  @Get(":roomId/messages")
  @ApiOkResponse({
    description: "List Messages Paginated",
    type: ResponseMessageListDto,
  })
  async findMessages(
    @Param("roomId", ParseIntPipe) roomId: number,
    @Query("limit", ParseIntPipe) limit: number = Constant.DEFAULT_LIMIT,
    @Query("offset", ParseIntPipe) offset: number = Constant.DEFAULT_OFFSET,
  ): Promise<ResponseMessageListDto> {
    return this.roomService.findMessages(roomId, limit, offset);
  }

    C√°c gi√° tr·ªã m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh c·ªßa m√¨nh gi·ªù ƒë√£ ƒë∆∞·ª£c b·ªè v√†o l·ªõp Constant

    export enum Constant {
  DEFAULT_LIMIT = 10,
  DEFAULT_OFFSET = 0,
}

    V√† room.service.ts ƒë√£ ng·∫Øn g·ªçn h∆°n nh·ªù kh√¥ng c·∫ßn ki·ªÉm tra v√† chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi d·ªØ li·ªáu n·ªØa:

      async findMessages(
    roomId: number,
    limit?: number,
    offset?: number
  ): Promise<MessagePagination> {
    const results = await this.model.find(
       { roomId: roomId }
    ).limit(limit).skip(offset).exec()

    return {
      count: results.length,
      results: results
    }
  }

    C√°ch 3: Th√™m query params startedAt, endedAt ƒë·ªÉ l·ªçc message theo time range

    Code version 2 ƒë√£ kh√° ·ªïn v·ªõi t·ªõ cho ƒë·∫øn khi t·ªõ c·∫ßn th√™m m·ªôt v√†i query params n·ªØa. startedAt v√† endedAt l√† hai query params gi√∫p l·ªçc c√°c message trong m·ªôt kho·∫£ng th·ªùi gian nh·∫•t ƒë·ªãnh.

    Khi ƒë√≥ code trong room.controller.ts c·ªßa t·ªõ nh∆∞ th·∫ø n√†y:

      @Get(":roomId/messages")
  async findMessages(
    @Param("roomId", ParseIntPipe) roomId: number,
    @Query("limit", ParseIntPipe) limit: number = Constant.DEFAULT_LIMIT,
    @Query("offset", ParseIntPipe) offset: number = Constant.DEFAULT_OFFSET,
    @Query("startedAt") startedAt?: string,
    @Query("endedAt") endedAt?: string,
  ): Promise<ResponseMessageListDto> {
    const optionals: QueryParamsFindMessage = {
      limit: limit,
      offset: offset,
      startAt: startedAt,
      endAt: endedAt
    }
    return this.roomService.findMessages(roomId, optionals);
  }

    C√≥ th·ªÉ th·∫•y m√¨nh c√≥ 4 query params, v√† m√¨nh ƒë√£ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng m·ªôt type QueryParamsFindMessage ƒë·ªÉ ki·ªÉm tra ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu c·ªßa c√°c params v√† ƒë·∫∑t n√≥ chung v√†o m·ªôt object l√† optionals ƒë·ªÉ truy·ªÅn n√≥ ƒëi cho g·ªçn.

    export type QueryParamsFindMessage = {
  limit: number,
  offset: number,
  startedAt?: string,
  endedAt?: string
}

    V√† ti·∫øp theo trong room.service.ts m√¨nh c≈©ng ƒë√£ th·ª±c hi·ªán l·ªçc message theo time range.

    async findMessages(
    roomId: number,
    optionals: QueryParamsFindMessage,
  ): Promise<ResponseMessageListDto> {
    const room = await this.roomModel.findOne({ problemId: roomId });

    if (!room) {
      throw new NotFoundException();
    }

    let { limit, offset, startAt, endAt } = optionals

    const results = await this.messageModel
      .find({
        problemId: roomId,
        createdAt: {
          $gte: startAt ? new Date(startAt) : room.startedAt,
          $lte: endAt ? new Date(endAt) : room.endedAt,
        }
      })
      .limit(limit)
      .skip(offset);

    return {
      count: results.length,
      results: results
    }
  }

    ·ªû ƒë√¢y, n·∫øu ƒë·ªÉ √Ω m·ªçi ng∆∞·ªùi s·∫Ω th·∫•y m√¨nh chuy·ªÉn ki·ªÉu d·ªØ li·ªáu string c·ªßa startedAt v√† endedAt th√†nh ki·ªÉu object Date b·∫±ng c√°ch t·∫°o new Date() v·ªõi gi√° tr·ªã string ƒë√≥.

    C√°ch 4: S·ª≠ d·ª•ng Dto v√† validator, transformer trong Dto

    Nh·ªØng t∆∞·ªüng c√°ch tr√™n ƒë√£ x·ªãn x√≤ r·ªìi, nh∆∞ng ƒë·ªìng b·ªçn c·ªßa m√¨nh g√≥p √Ω l√† c√≥ m·ªôt c√°ch l√† c√≥ th·ªÉ validate v√† transform tr√™n Dto lu√¥n. Cho n√™n m√¨nh ƒë√£ ƒë·ªçc th√™m k·ªπ h∆°n v·ªÅ class-validator, v√† t√¨m ki·∫øm quanh quanh v√† l√†m ƒë∆∞·ª£c version t·∫°m g·ªçi l√† cu·ªëi c√πng n√†y.

    ƒê√¢y l√† room.controller.ts v·ªõi t·∫•t c·∫£ query params quy v·ªÅ m·ªôt object t√™n l√† filterMessageDto.

      @Get(":roomId/messages")
  @ApiOkResponse({
    description: "List Messages Paginated",
    type: ResponseMessageListDto,
  })
  @UsePipes(new ValidationPipe({ transform: true }))
  async findMessages(
    @Param("roomId", ParseIntPipe) roomId: number,
    @Query() filerMessageDto: FilterMessageDto
  ): Promise<ResponseMessageListDto> {
    return this.roomService.findMessages(roomId, filerMessageDto);
  }

    X·ªãn ch∆∞a, v·∫≠y l√† kh√¥ng c√≤n b·ªã m·ªôt m·ªõ query params n·ªØa. √Ä, m·ªôt l∆∞u √Ω nh·ªè l√† d√≤ng:

    @UsePipes(new ValidationPipe({ transform: true }))

    ch√≠nh l√† c√°ch m√¨nh cho ph√©p controller c·ªßa m√¨nh s·ª≠ d·ª•ng validation pipe v√† cho ph√©p transform data.

    C√≤n ƒë√¢y l√† FilterMessageDto d√πng ƒë·ªÉ v·ª´a ki·ªÉm tra type, v·ª´a validate v√† c√≤n c·∫£ transformer n·ªØa.

    import { Type } from "class-transformer";
import { IsOptional, IsInt, IsDate } from "class-validator";
import { Constant } from "../../common/constant";

export class FilterMessageDto {
  @IsOptional()
  @IsInt()
  @Type(() => Number)
  limit?: number = Constant.DEFAULT_LIMIT;


  @IsOptional()
  @IsInt()
  @Type(() => Number)
  offset?: number = Constant.DEFAULT_OFFSET;

  @IsOptional()
  @IsDate()
  @Type(() => Date)
  startedAt?: Date;

  @IsOptional()
  @IsDate()
  @Type(() => Date)
  endedAt?: Date;
}

    ·ªû ƒë√¢y, m√¨nh ƒë√£ d√πng transformer v·ªõi @Type() ƒë·ªÉ chuy·ªÉn c√°c lo·∫°i params v·ªÅ ki·ªÉu m√¨nh mong mu·ªën. ƒê·ªìng th·ªùi c≈©ng d√πng @IsOptional() ƒë·ªÉ n√≥ b·ªè qua khi truy·ªÅn v√†o null/undefined.

    Cu·ªëi c√πng l√† trong room.service.ts m√¨nh kh√¥ng c√≤n c·∫ßn ph·∫£i chuy·ªÉn string qua Date cho startedAt, endedAt n·ªØa.

      async findMessages(
    roomId: number,
    filerMessageDto: FilterMessageDto,
  ): Promise<ResponseMessageListDto> {
    const room = await this.roomModel.findOne({ problemId: roomId });

    if (!room) {
      throw new NotFoundException();
    }

    const { limit, offset, startedAt, endedAt } = filerMessageDto;

    const results = await this.messageModel
      .find({
        problemId: roomId,
        createdAt: {
          $gte: startedAt || room.startedAt,
          $lte: endedAt || room.endedAt,
        },
      })
      .limit(limit)
      .skip(offset);
      
      return {
        count: results.length,
        results: results
      }
    }

    V·∫≠y l√† m√¨nh ƒë√£ c√πng nhau th·ª±c h√†nh qua c√°ch validation khi l√†m vi·ªác v·ªõi query params r·ªìi, ƒë√∫ng l√† c√≥ nhi·ªÅu c√°ch gh√™ nh·ªâ.

    C∆° m√† NestJS m·∫°nh gh√™ ha, code nh√¨n s·∫°ch ƒë·∫πp h·∫≥n ·∫•y. M√¨nh th√≠ch ƒëi·ªÅu ƒë√≥ üòÄ
